name: yellowpop
description:
yellowpop was created from our fear of white walls and sad spaces.

We wanted to find a simple way to fill an empty room with joy and warmth.
 
Our inspiration came from where people are happiest ‚Äì outside, soaking up the sunshine. So we found a way to replicate the glow and energy that comes from a day spent in the sun (minus the vitamin D), and that‚Äôs when yellowpop was born.
 
Whether it‚Äôs day or night, whether you‚Äôre at home, the office or an event, you can flip on one of our neons and watch the space around it glow. And if you look around, you‚Äôll see the faces of those who look at the neon glow as well ‚Äì both literally and figuratively.
 
Neons have a way of bringing immediate joy to everyone around them, thanks to their warm glow and upbeat vibes.
 
Seeing that glow is what keeps us excited to grow and innovate on our product offerings.

jobs.title: Growth Marketer  (REMOTE OK)
jobs.description:
Who we are?

#FOEW : Fear Of Empty Walls üöÄ


We offer products that will bring some pop to your space.
yellowpop was created from our fear of white walls and sad spaces.


Our first product is the neon sign. We have thought over the whole process to create a neon sign, which lets us produce beautiful, creative neon lights unbreakable, lighter with low consumption and more affordable than ever.


We are the #1 online neon sign company with 9.7/10 on Trustpilot and working with some very famous b2b clients as well as b2c. 


‚Äî‚Äî

We are growing incredibly fast and would like to hire a Head of Aquisition (digital mostly).


This role is highly cross-functional and requires credibility with executive stakeholders as well as hands-on experience.


You will have the ability to change and **impact a business on a day to day**.


Owning the ad creation process in conjunction with the design team by building briefs, gathering customer insights and sharing learnings
Owning the website, landing pages and CRO
Implementing customer retention strategies
Email Marketing automations and campaigns
Identifying new audiences and segments to market to for both our prospecting and remarketing campaign
Building experimentation documents and running tests to uncover new opportunities within our paid channels
Transfering learnings from existing Paid channels to potential new channel tests like Pinterest, Snapchat, Twitter & TikTok
Reporting on and analyzing campaign, audience and ad data to discover areas for improvement and optimization


Experience working across digital marketing channels
Experience with paid acquisition and ad platforms, e.g. Facebook Ads, Google, etc.
Experience with Klaviyo or similar ESP
Experience with an e-commerce / product company is a plus 
High affinity for data and proficiency with Excel (bonus points for experience with Cross-Channel/Attribution Tracking)
Strong understanding of growth frameworks and funnels
Experience collaborating on projects cross-functionally, specifically with a design team
Strong written and verbal communication skills
Ability to write insight-driven briefs for creative teams
FRENCH SPEAKER is a huge plus 

Benefit & Details 

Bonus 
Team trip 
Remote but we have office in NYC, Paris and London 
UK contract or contractor BUT with all the employee benefit : 
Health insurance 
Holidays 
Co-working 
Equity

jobs.title: Passionate B2B Sales Development Representative (remote)
jobs.description:
Who we are? 

We offer handmade LED neon signs that will bring some pop to your space.

yellowpop was created from our fear of white walls and sad spaces.

We wanted to find a simple way to fill an empty room with joy and warmth.

Our inspiration came from where people are happiest ‚Äì outside, soaking up the sunshine. So we found a way to replicate the glow and energy that comes from a day spent in the sun (minus the vitamin D), and that‚Äôs when yellowpop was born

We are looking someone to join our team and spread the word and the love about our product. Every day we interact with a lot of different B2B customers that buy our products for different use cases. We have identified key type of customers and location that we‚Äôd like to develop with outbound marketing strategy. 

Our business developer will be supported by a strong inbound marketing strategy (blog, content, online ads, SEO) and will be supported by our marketing team for marketing collaterals and content.

What we are looking for 

Successful track record in B2B sales and negotiation
Tech savvy, always looking for the next hack to find leads: web scrapping, data-mining. Very curious about growth hacking technics.
Strong analytical skills and curiosity to understand the market and the key customers. (Build buyer personas..)
A Sales email guru, you not how to create sequences and has a strong experience in email marketing and using a CRM (Hubspot, Salesforce, Pipe drive) 
A call machine: you aren‚Äôt afraid to pick up the phone and do sessions of cold calling on key contacts/ leads. 
Proficiency with forecasting and budgeting 
Excellent verbal and written communication skills. 
Native English speaker - French is a big plus. 

What we offer üöÄ

Opportunity to work remotely

An opportunity to join a fast growing start-up!

Attractive commissions 

A huge market to conquer.

A fast-paced environment where you can leave your mark!

The ability to work and grow among an incredible team.
